testcase.classname: As an administrator, I want to be able to create a new FAQ record via API connection
testcase.name: When a POST request containing invalid authorization credentials and necessary information (title, description)
testcase.system-out: * The api user constructs the base url with the "invalid" token.............passed * The api user sets "api/faqsAdd" path parameters...........................passed * The api user prepares a POST request containing the necessary information to send to the api faqsAdd endpoint..passed * The api user sends the POST request and saves the response returned from the api faqsAdd endpoint..passed * The api user verifies that the status code is 401.........................passed * The api user verifies that the message information in the response body is "Unauthenticated.".passed
